display_long_description:
Dive into the world of entrepreneurship with EquityX, a virtual reality game designed exclusively for Meta Quest. Step into the shoes of a savvy investor and take control of struggling startups. Your mission? Turn them into profitable ventures by making strategic decisions and selling their products using your VR controllers. Experience the thrill of business management in an immersive environment like never before!

Features:

Buy Struggling Startups: Identify and invest in underperforming companies with high potential.

Transform Businesses: Implement strategic financial decisions to turn the tide and drive profitability.

Product Sales: Use your VR controllers to interact with and sell your company's products.

Realistic Business Scenarios: Navigate through realistic financial challenges and opportunities.

Interactive Gameplay: Engage in hands-on tasks that simulate real-world business operations.
